excerpt.rendered: The Data Management Group provides expertise in data planning, collection, standardization, documentation, storage, sharing, and long-term preservation. The core focus of the Data Management Group’s work is development and maintenance of the integrated Rule-Oriented Data System (iRODS), which is open-source data management software that enables research and commercial organizations, government agencies, and mission critical environments worldwide to test, document, control, and protect their data.

excerpt.rendered: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.

description.simple_value_formatted: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. These include the HeLx platform used in neuroscience, plant genomics, and clinical research projects. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.

excerpt.rendered: RENCI creates cyberinfrastructure solutions that enhance scientific research. With expertise in networking, architectures, distributed systems, and applications, our work enables secure and efficient collaboration and data management for cutting-edge computer science and data-intensive domain research.

excerpt.rendered: The Earth Data Science (EDS) Group focuses on projects that advance fundamental science and support and inform decision-making in critical areas like climate, weather, natural hazards, and environmental health. They explore how data science, team science, and knowledge management can address complex issues in the coastal hazards, environment and health (geohealth), and geo-related sociotechnical spaces through their combined expertise in software engineering, geospatial analytics, machine learning, ocean modeling, and remote sensing. Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

excerpt.rendered: The Analytics and Data Science Group partners with researchers across a broad range of domains to advance their research by the application of analytics. The group takes a broad approach to analytics including AI and machine learning, visual analytics, and semantic web and knowledge graphs, among other techniques.
